message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects the true worth of its features and benefits.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value, but I believe I can't afford the full price. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think $15,000 would be a fair price for the product considering my budget constraints. Could we possibly reach an agreement at this amount?
